类 RegulaFalsiRootFinder

  • java.lang.Object

  • 直接已知子类:
    ImprovedRegulaFalsiRootFinder

    public class RegulaFalsiRootFinder
extends RootFinder
    The root finder class that implements the regula falsi algorithm.

      • RegulaFalsiRootFinder

        public RegulaFalsiRootFinder​(Function function,
                             float xMin,
                             float xMax)
                      throws RootFinder.InvalidIntervalException
        Constructor.
        参数:
        function - the functions whose roots to find
        xMin - the initial x-value where the function is negative
        xMax - the initial x-value where the function is positive
        抛出:
        RootFinder.InvalidIntervalException
